title: League Of Legends Coach Spectate
body:
It would be nice if the new client came with a spectate option, in which someone can queue up with you as a spectator and watch the game live. 

- What you can see will be the same as playing in the game
- Good to teach people about mistakes as they happen
- Cant be bothered playing with some friends? Watch their game along with them as they play
- People can properly be coached by someone of superior skill and help with the learning curve

**_I know this is pretty much the same thing seen in dota 2_**. However i believe it would add to the experience of League, especially in someone learning to play.

replies.body: Having a real coaching system will help a ton of players get back into the game since you could always have a friend watch your games and help you out along they way.

You forgot sight will only be limited to allies. Otherwise people might tattle-tale on the enemy team's locations. Even then unsportsmanlike people might befriend somebody on the enemy team and feed the other side info...if the match was serious over something. But yeah, that'd be really nice in the game.
What you can see will be the same as playing in the game. I guess I should have clarified that a bit more
